```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
td <- read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dashapetrova/2019_hse_data_analysis/master/hw2_Bayesian_inference/hw2_phoible.csv')
```

### 2.1
```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
td %>% 
  mutate(res = consonants/phonemes) %>% 
  filter(res == max(res)) ->
  l
l$language
```

### 2.2
```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
a_prior=9.300246
b_prior=4.4545
dt %>% 
  mutate(module = abs((consonants/phonemes)-((consonants+a_prior)/(phonemes+a_prior+b_prior)))) -> dt
dt %>% 
  arrange(desc(module)) %>% 
  head() %>% 
  select(language)
```
